java.lang.Object

extends Object
implements LithneListener, XBeeListener, MessageListener

isValid

public boolean isValid()
This function checks whether the message has a valid 64-bit XBeeAddress or valid 16-bit XBeeAddress. Returns 'true' if the message can be send. Returns 'false' if the message can't be send.

equalsDestination

This function checks whether the specified message and this message have an equal destination address. If this is the case, returns 'true' otherwise this function returns 'false'

public boolean argumentsFull()

setFunction

public void setFunction(String function)
Change the function specified in the message using a String. The String is first hashed to a number, before being set. Please note that you can use maximum of ~250 characters.
